title: Looking for 5 Bronze players!!! to make a team! Low silver accepted
body:
Just gonna start off with hello friends it is time for me to start a new pet project.
I will be you Coach/Manager/Analyst or all 3 at once hue hue

But seriously im looking for players WHO PLAY 5+ HOURS DAILLLLYYY!!!!! so yea im looking for bums that want to improve. NO EXCEPTIONS!! NATA
This is a little wee project I wana run to help people improve I will only need 3 or 4 of the days of the week.

You will be given little tasks to complete, while you solo que.
And while you play ranks team ranks, you will be given another set of tasks to complete in each games.
So its sorta like a check list but it will be done on a point based system. 

BUT MORE OF THAT LATER!!!!!
IF INTERESTED PLEASE PLEASE add ign Wolves 
I DO NOT REALLY CHECK THE Boards that much so your best shot is to add me and tell me that your interested.

BUT THE MOST IMPORTANT THING OF ALL IS THAT YOU DO NOT RAGE AT YOUR TEAM MATES AND ACKNOWLEDGE YOUR MISTAKES.
NO POINTING OUT OTHER PEOPLES MISTAKES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

MUST HAVE VOICE CHAT- CURSE VOICE MOST LIKELY!!

replies.body: Interested if you still have room
I think we have 5 now but fell free to add me just incase i kick people for being rude

3 more players left, quickly im on now add me and tell me your interested so i can sort a team and get you guys under way, but remember 5+ hours DAILY!!!!! so i can work out a timetable that bet suits people
